Plot: Two friends hired to police a small town that is suffering under the rule of a rancher find their job complicated by the arrival of a young widow.
Title: Appaloosa
Writer: Robert Knott (screenplay), Ed Harris (screenplay), Robert B. Parker (novel)
Actors: Robert Jauregui, Jeremy Irons, Timothy V. Murphy, Luce Rains
tomatoConsensus: A traditional genre western, Appaloosa sets itself apart with smart psychology, an intriguing love triangle, and good chemistry between the leads.
